subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Before he led the investigation into Penn State’s role in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case, Louis J. Freeh, the former F.B.I. director, was involved in many high-profile cases.
snippet: Before he led the investigation into Penn State’s role in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case, Louis J. Freeh, the former F.B.I. director, was involved in many high-profile cases.
